#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<vector>
typedef unsigned long long ull;
using namespace std;

// Inner helper function to give gcd
ull gcd(ull a,ull b){
	if(a%b==0)
		return b;
	else
		return gcd(b,a%b);
}

bool pow_2(ull a){
	return  a&(a-1);
}

int main(){
	int t;
	ull p,q,g,a;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--){
		scanf("%llu %llu",&p,&q);
		g = gcd(p,q);
		//cout<<g<<endl;
		p /= g;
		q /= g;
		//printf("%llu/%llu and gcd is %d\n",p,q,g);
		a = q;
		
		while(a % 2 == 0) a /= 2;
		if(pow_2(a+1) == 1){
			printf("NO\n");
			continue;
		}
		else{
			if(pow_2(p) == 0  && (p <= q+1)){
				printf("YES\n");continue;
			}
			else
				printf("NO\n");
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
